[Directions to City Hall](https://www.google.com/maps?q=city%20hall%20antioch%2C%20ca&hl=en&ll=38.016197%2C-121.81504&spn=0.000068%2C0.03386&hq=city%20hall&hnear=Antioch%2C%20Contra%20Costa%2C%20California&t=m&z=15&layer=c&cbll=38.016197%2C-121.81504&panoid=vHQRFPjZWVzFbiZu9tJSKQ&cbp=12%2C16.43%2C%2C0%2C-6.84)

1. [Government](https://www.antiochca.gov/government "Government") /
2. [City Council](https://www.antiochca.gov/government/city-council "City Council") /

# City Council

The City Council represents residents and businesses in Antioch and is made up of Antioch’s mayor, who is elected at large, and four City Council members elected by voters in their districts. The four Council Members are elected to four-year overlapping terms. The Mayor is directly elected to a four-year term. The Council appoints the City Manager, City Attorney, and members of advisory committees.

![mayor ron bernal](https://www.antiochca.gov/wp-content/uploads/2024/12/mayor-ron-bernal-300x300.png)

### [Ron Bernal](https://www.ci.antioch.ca.us/government/city-council/ron-bernal)

#### [Mayor](https://www.antiochca.gov/government/city-council/ron-bernal)

**District:** at large

#### [Mayor Pro Tem](https://www.antiochca.gov/government/city-council/louie-rocha)

**District:** 2
